channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 新加坡欲逮捕去年出人意料收购曼联的芬兰企业家
item.description: Singapore seeks to arrest Finnish entrepreneur who made a surprise bid for Manchester United last year trib.al/5Dnl7RX

item.title: 从税收到支出和增长预测，以下是南非财政部长戈东瓦纳的预算要点
item.description: From taxes to spending and growth forecasts, here are the highlights of South African Finance Minister Godongwana’s budget trib.al/aCr01qK

item.title: 自 2 月份开始加息以来，最大私募股权公司的收益率骤降 49
item.description: Payouts from the biggest private equity firms plummet 49% since the Feb began raising interest rates trib.al/ANu9xzR

item.title: 南非将发布一份由德国专家编写的关于国家公用事业公司 Eskom 旗下燃煤发电厂状况的报告
item.description: South Africa will release a report on the state of coal-fired power plants owned by state utility Eskom that was prepared by German experts trib.al/IBpuSTu

item.title: 根据《预算审查》，国家财政部通过从黄金和外汇应急储备账户提款，降低了借款需求总额
item.description: National Treasury lowers gross borrowing requirement through drawdown from the Gold and Foreign Exchange Contingency Reserve Account, according to the Budget Review trib.al/VRcuf3T

item.title: @CrowleyKev 写道：圭亚那的国库将迎来大量石油财富，但总统伊尔法安-阿里正在寻找原油以外的其他用途。
item.description: Guyana's coffers are set for an influx of oil wealth, but President Irfaan Ali is looking beyond crude to spend it, writes @CrowleyKev trib.al/aMoxHz1

item.title: 兰特走强，因为南非表示将动用中央银行的应急储备金，降低政府的债务轨迹和借贷要求
item.description: The rand strengthens as South Africa said it will tap the central bank’s contingency reserves, lowering the government’s debt trajectory and borrowing requirements trib.al/zhypjiU

item.title: RT by @markets：爆料：南非表示将动用央行应急储备金，降低借贷要求，导致兰特跳水
item.description: BREAKING: Rand jumps after South Africa says it will tap the central bank’s contingency reserves, lowering borrowing requirements trib.al/lQfkSsI

item.title: 南非国库计划引入新的财政锚，为公共财政提供可持续的长期发展道路
item.description: South Africa’s National Treasury plans to introduce a new fiscal anchor to provide a sustainable long-term path for public finances trib.al/I72T2zK

item.title:
投资者正在寻找创造性的方式投资 SpaceX，押注星链公司最终的首次公开募股。
在本期《埃隆公司》播客节目中，@EdLudlow 谈到了 SpaceX 的员工并不是唯一持有公司股票的人。
item.description:
Investors are finding creative ways to invest in SpaceX, betting on an eventual Starlink IPO.

On this episode of the Elon, Inc. podcast, @EdLudlow talks about how SpaceX's employees aren't the only ones holding stock in the company trib.al/Rd8RgPG

item.title:
RT by @markets：更新：南非表示将动用央行应急储备，兰特走强，当地债券收益率下降
关注预算的实时更新：
item.description:
UPDATE: The rand strengthened and local bond yields dropped as South Africa said it will tap the central bank’s contingency reserves

Follow live updates form the budget: trib.al/IqlQZop

item.title: 南非国有电力公司 Eskom 因未能满足附加条件，将失去国家财政部之前分配的部分债务减免资金
item.description: South Africa’s state power utility Eskom will lose a portion of the debt relief it was previously allocated by the National Treasury after it failed to meet the attached conditions trib.al/h3QdIMX

item.title: 亿万富翁、餐馆老板兼赌场大亨蒂尔曼-费尔蒂塔认为，职业冰球队是休斯顿市中心经济的下一个基石
item.description: Billionaire restaurateur and casino magnate Tilman Fertitta sees a professional hockey team as the next building block for the downtown Houston economy trib.al/iFEJ1Gn

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率自 12 月初以来首次跃升至 7% 以上，打击了房地产市场的复苏势头
item.description: US mortgage rates jumped above 7% for the first time since early December, dealing a blow to the housing market’s nascent recovery trib.al/P4g5g4B

item.title: 南非在预算中明显胜出，但却从纳税人身上榨取了更多收入。以下是谁将从选举前的预算中受益
item.description: South Africa delivered clear winners in its budget, but squeezed more revenue out of taxpayers. Here’s who’ll benefit from the pre-election budget trib.al/WfHMa4t

item.title: 南非财政部长戈东瓦纳动用该国的黄金和外汇储备稳定其令人瞠目的债务，同时在关键的选举年增加教师、护士和福利方面的支出
item.description: South Africa’s Finance Minister Godongwana taps the country’s gold and foreign-exchange reserves to steady its eye-watering debt, while boosting spending on teachers, nurses and welfare in a critical election year trib.al/DZCHcUd

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德创建投资金融基础设施的资金池
item.description: Brookfield Creating Pool to Invest in Financial Infrastructure trib.al/mpAQFQN

item.title: 丹麦政府委托的一个咨询小组表示，丹麦应向农民征收碳税，以实现国家气候目标和欧盟承诺
item.description: Denmark should introduce a carbon tax on farmers to meet its national climate goal and EU commitments, a government-commissioned advisory group says trib.al/AZGKvuF

item.title: 全球贸易体系的管理者下周召开会议，对电子商务征收关税将成为讨论议题
item.description: The caretakers of the global trading system met next week, and putting tariffs on e-commerce will be up for debate trib.al/ezl4Vpz

item.title:
RT by @markets：#Esports are exploding.技术正在将玩家的体验推向新的高度，奖金池日益丰厚，而人工智能有望永远改变游戏规则。在 3 月 7 日于吉达举行的 #PowerPlayers 峰会上，我们将与 EFG（ESL FaceIt Group）联席首席执行官 Craig Levine 和电竞世界杯基金会首席执行官 Ralf Reichert 一起深入探讨沙特的电竞生态系统，了解推动这一蓬勃发展的新经济的赛事、玩家和创造者。
立即注册：
item.description:
#Esports are exploding. Tech is pushing gamers' experiences to new heights, prize pools are growing evermore lucrative and #AI promises to change the game forever. At at the #PowerPlayers Summit in Jeddah on 7th March, we dive into the Saudi esports ecosystem with Craig Levine, Co-CEO of EFG (ESL FaceIt Group) and Ralf Reichert, CEO, Esports World Cup Foundation to discover the events, players and creators who are driving this flourishing new economy.

Register now: bloom.bg/3HI8s22

item.title: 企业领导人计划在明年留住员工并提高价格，以利用消费者信心的改善
item.description: Business leaders are planning to hold onto staff over the next year and hike prices to take advantage of improving consumer confidence trib.al/V6QTqMp

item.title: 前摩根士丹利亚洲区主席、耶鲁大学高级讲师斯蒂芬-罗奇（Stephen Roach）表示，中国要想让香港这个金融中心拥有更美好的未来，就必须解决经济问题，让香港自己管理自己。
item.description: China must fix its economy and let Hong Kong run itself if it wants a better future for the financial hub, former Morgan Stanley Asia chair and a senior lecturer at Yale University Stephen Roach says trib.al/89QfI7i

item.title: 摩根士丹利前亚洲区主席史蒂芬-罗奇（Stephen Roach）表示，中国若想让香港金融中心拥有更美好的未来，就必须解决经济问题，让香港自己管理自己。
item.description: China must fix its economy and let Hong Kong run itself if it wants a better future for the financial hub, former Morgan Stanley Asia chair Stephen Roach said trib.al/pitsUS0

item.title: 价值 280 亿美元的 USDC 稳定币运营商停止了对加密企业家 Justin Sun 创建的 Tron 区块链的支持
item.description: The operator of the $28 billion USDC stablecoin axed support for the Tron blockchain created by crypto entrepreneur Justin Sun trib.al/rVaR44z

item.title: 近 8000 名韩国实习医生没有报到上班，以抗议政府增加医学院学额的计划
item.description: Nearly 8,000 South Korean trainee doctors have not reported for work in a protest against a government plan to increase the number of seats at medical schools trib.al/2b7KZLp

item.title: 在冻结了一家大型基金的账户后，中国两大证券交易所誓言加强对量化交易的监管。
item.description: China’s two main stock exchanges vowed to tighten supervision of quant trading after freezing a major fund's accounts in an unusually harsh punishment trib.al/ZSVU8UZ

item.title: 慕尼黑安全会议暴露了欧盟与中国在欧盟最大的安全问题--乌克兰战争--上日益加深的分歧
item.description: The Munich Security Conference exposed the growing divisions between the EU and China over the bloc’s biggest security concern: the war in Ukraine trib.al/GxMiQgV

item.title: 最新文件显示，加密货币超级政治行动委员会 Fairshake 从亿万富翁双胞胎卡梅隆-温克艾沃斯（Cameron Winklevoss）和泰勒-温克艾沃斯（Tyler Winklevoss）那里筹集了 490 万美元。
item.description: Fairshake, the crypto super PAC, raised $4.9 million from billionaire twins Cameron Winklevoss and Tyler Winklevoss, its latest filings show trib.al/awyndZG

item.title:
乔-拜登希望通过排挤中国来打造本土电动汽车供应链，这一梦想可能会对特斯拉和整个美国汽车行业产生反作用。
阅读大事件 ⬇️
item.description:
Joe Biden's dream to create a homegrown EV supply chain by marginalizing China could backfire on Tesla, and the wider US car industry.

Read The Big Take ⬇️ trib.al/azLFZTV

item.title: Thoma Bravo 正在考虑出售消费者情报提供商 J.D. Power，包括债务在内的出售价格约为 80 亿美元。
item.description: Thoma Bravo is weighing a sale of consumer intelligence provider J.D. Power and looking for about $8 billion including debt trib.al/WAxjrnw
